price: 192. Geen hulp kunnen zij hen geven, noch kunnen zij zichzelf helpen.
arabic: وَلَا يَسۡتَطِيعُونَ لَهُمۡ نَصۡرٗا وَلَآ أَنفُسَهُمۡ يَنصُرُونَ

version.title: Dutch translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Dutch language, for the Dutch Islamic Center - in progress.

meta.transliteration: walā yastaṭīʿūna lahum naṣran walā anfusahum yanṣurūna
